name: Operation Hellfish
description:
Who are you?: You are a fish.

What's your objective?: To kill.

How?: With f*cking bubbles.

Wait, really?: Yes.

Explore the ocean, find enemies and slay them. The ocean is a cruel place to live, and you have to overcome it.

Explore, survive, shoot, kill, and get the top score.

Sent for the Bullet Hell Jam, 22/04/2021, updated download file to include '.pck' file, necessary for the game to work 😅 (no game files were touched)

May continue development later on.
